$comment: a subclass of "referrable" being used to refer to a unique article on the web.

allOf.$comment: the "name" property is used to represent the human-readable "full" citation, whereas the "uri" property represents the URI of the article, and may start either with "https://" or with "doi:", depending on the type of the article.

reference_type.$comment: a string representing how this citation works in the context.

uri.$comment: for a citation, the URI must start either from "https://" or "doi:"
